name: Mouse House - Global Game Jam 2019
description:
Being a mouse in this world can be kind of difficult, but if there is one thing you can always count on is the warmth of your house ! You just moved to your new mouse house and it needs some decoration... Venture into the living room of your human neighbor and find a few furniture to find your home!

Credits : @LucieLescuyer &  @aStrkl

Controls :

Left click to move
Left click on a cover to hide
Right click to squeak to reveal objects

-Made in 48h by 2 People during the Global Game Jam 2019

Jam Site: 
Pocket Jam

Jam year: 
2019

Platforms: 
MS Windows, Web standard (HTML5, Java, JavaScript, Flash)

Tools and Technologies: 
Unity (any product)

Technology Notes: 
Software used : 3ds Max, Photoshop, Audacity, Unity.

Installation Instructions: 

To install game : Unzip and launch MouseHouse.exe !

Credits: 

Alexandre Stroukoff & Lucie Lescuyer for Art/Design/Programmation/Sound/FX
